attributes.action: Not charge those married to British Citizens to remain in the UK if not yet passed British Citizenship Test
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Some people are trying hard to learn English to get to the Level to pass British citizen test and those who's visa's run out in the time are being hit with having to find more money to remain here in the UK. So those Married to British Citizen shouldn't have to pay more they've payed enough already just to be living with there Partner here in the UK.
